verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Anointing fall on me
Anointing fall on me

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Let the power of the Holy Ghost
Fall on me
Anointing fall on me

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Touch my hands; my mouth and my heart.
Fill my life, Lord; every part.
And let the power of the Holy Ghost,
Fall on me.
Anointing fall on me
